titles: An exhortation to prayer for Jerusalems peace in a sermon preached at Dorchester at the Affizes holden there for the county of Dorset, March 19, 1662 / by Henry Glover.
author: Glover, Henry, b. 1624 or 5.
publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for William Church-hill,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
